wiki.content:
"Are You Gonna Go My Way" is the first single to be released by Lenny Kravitz from the album of the same name. It was released in March 1993. It was written by Lenny Kravitz and Craig Ross. The single has been covered by numerous artists, such as Metallica, in a medley for "MTV Hits" at the 2003 MTV Music Video Awards, Tom Jones and Robbie Williams on Jones' 1999 album Reload and Melanie Brown in her solo section, on the Spice Girls Reunion Tour. Serbian hard rock band Cactus Jack recorded a version on their live cover album DisCover in 2002. A remixed version is played as the opening theme song in Gran Turismo 3. The song is featured in Guitar Hero: World Tour, it is available as downloadable content for the Rock Band series, and it is a playable song in Guitar Hero: On Tour Decades. It ranked #78 on VH1's 100 Greatest Songs of the 90s.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Are You Gonna Go My Way" is the first single to be released by Lenny Kravitz from the album of the same name. It was released in March 1993. It was written by Lenny Kravitz and Craig Ross. The single has been covered by numerous artists, such as Metallica, in a medley for "MTV Hits" at the 2003 MTV Music Video Awards, Tom Jones and Robbie Williams on Jones' 1999 album Reload and Melanie Brown in her solo section, on the Spice Girls Reunion Tour.

track.name: Are You Gonna Go My Way
comments: Yeah Lenny and those locs yeah baby

GUITAR HERO WORLD TOUR
one of the best songs to play
The guitar solo is great but the bass under evenmore so. Those drums swing HARD
by all accounts Kylie did (go his way) LOL = Lucky ol' Lenny :)
this man! if I had dreads i would shake em, but i don't so my hair will have to do :)
always has and always will be a great rock song ><
Great song ! Thank you very much Nita :-)
Gran Turismo 3 became five times cooler when this song started playing.
